unimed-company: Unimed Vales do Taquari e Rio Pardo

about.first-paragraph: Known as "Ale," I enjoy practicing sports, working, studying, and constantly evolving in my pursuit of new knowledge and specializations.
about.second-paragraph: Immersed in technology since childhood, today I am certain that I am doing what I love (even with the daily challenges).
about.third-paragraph: Among my educational qualifications, I hold a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and I am taking courses to achieve proficiency in the English language.
about.fourth-paragraph: Currently, I am working as a Intermediate Systems Analyst.
